item.description: You are invited to the North Shore "Singles and Couples" Dance Party Tuesday Nights at the Bangkok Paradise Restaurant at 90 Washington St. Salem, Ma. 01970. Web site bangkokparadise.com Join with us for a great fun filled night of dinning, social dancing and lessons. Entertainment Cover charge only $5. A full menu of Thai Cuisine is available at your leisure and expense. Take our mini lessons and learn many new dances with lots of very cool sexy moves. Casual Dress and jeans Ok. Our social dance night starts off at 7 pm with beginner dance instruction with Shana and Deb. Hope to see you soon at our next social Meet Up partying with our North Shore Crowd, D J Dancin Guy
item.name: North Shore "Singles and Couples" Dance Party Meet Up
